list.name: device
list.label: Device
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(bucket: "telemetry", tag: "device", predicate: (r) => r.device != "solidserver-agent" and r.device != "mobile-xiaomi")

targets.query:
from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and r._field == "usage_active" and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device =~ /${device:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem" and r._field == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device =~ /${device:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r._field == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device =~ /${device:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["device"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r._field == "load1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device =~ /${device:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "temp" and r._field == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device =~ /${device:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
